title: Add --all flag to rm command
description: Allow users to remove all variants of a card at once with 'pkm rm --all lang:set:card'
close_reason: Successfully implemented --all flag for rm command. Users can now remove all variants of a card with 'pkm rm --all de:me01:001'. Test coverage added.

title: Add language filtering to pkm list command
description: Users should be able to filter their collection by language (e.g., pkm list de, pkm list en). Requires adding language column to database and updating list command.
close_reason: Successfully implemented language filtering for pkm list command. Users can now filter by language (e.g., pkm list de, pkm list en) and cards display their language in the list view.
